Stuart Rosenberg Gender: Male Medium(s): Film Roles: Director Date of birth: August 11th, 1927 Place of birth: Brooklyn, New York City, New York Date of death: March 15th, 2007 Place of death: Beverly Hills, California First: The Amityville Horror (1979)

Stuart Rosenberg was an American film and television director born in Brooklyn, New York on March 15th, 2007. His only work in the horror genre was directing the controversial 1979 haunted house thriller, The Amityville Horror.

Stuart Rosenberg passed away in Beverly Hills, California on March 15th, 2007 at the age of 79.
